extension.name: HTML Template Parser
extension.description: This is the main class of an extension, is the entry point from which configurations, connection providers, operations and sources are going to be declared.

parameter.name: outputMimeType
parameter.description: The mime type of the payload that this operation outputs.

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The name of a variable on which the operation's output will be placed

parameter.name: targetValue
parameter.description: An expression that will be evaluated against the operation's output and the outcome of that expression will be stored in the target variable
